pullRequest.title: Enable geo_distance and geo_bounding_box queries on geo_shape field type
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit enables geo_distance and geo_bounding_box queries on geo_shape field type. In addition it enables those queries over geo_point runtime fields as well.
closes #54628

commit.message: Enable geo_distance and geo_bounding_box queries on geo_shape field type
